Posts.Content: Apr 17, 2012 03:41PM Sarahmfallon wrote: I had the option of doing it once every 3 weeks for 9 weeks or just doing 9 weeks total. My doctor said in studies it showed to be almost the same effectivness but the lesser dosage at a time made it so I might be able to keep my hair.  I am not getting Neulast, just the C/T and anti-naseua beforehand.  It is about 2.5 hours each week.  Before this treatment (before my BMX and DIEP) I was doing Cisplatin and Gemsidomine (sp?) every 3 weeks for 4 sessions.  I didnt lose my hair on that either and had very minimal side effects, just headache and tiredness.  Hoping it stays the same for the next 6 weeks. Best wishes to you!
Posts.Title: Taxotere/Cytoxan weekly treatment question Sarahmfallon Sarahmfallon

Posts.Content: Apr 16, 2012 06:24PM Sarahmfallon wrote: Hi all.  Just an update since I hadnt heard from anyone (not sure if anyone has done this or not) but if you are wondering - I just finished week 3 of my Cytoxan/Taxotere treatment and have not lost my hair!  Fingers crossed it stays that way!!
